MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG4 postcode area of Dumfries, affecting properties in Sanquhar and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 9:16AM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working on the overhead line fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6PM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:35PM on 14 February 2021
